about_the_game:
Shujinkou's Art is here... in a digital book!

The Shujinkou Digital Artbook contains over 35 wide pages of sketches and renders for character art, enemy art, backgrounds, environments, UI, minigame art, story illustrations, and more.

Take a look through a custom Table of Contents system and a selection of seven different songs to listen to as you peruse the artbook.

View the Art in an application... or download it as a PDF!

Check out the artbook and the seven different looping background tracks from the game via the homemade Shujinkou Digital Artbook application, which supports free page movement, zoom in/out, and more. If you want to download the PDF and view it without the need to run Steam or any execution files, please download the PDF through the title screen!

content_descriptors.notes: Some illustrations and sketches have partial nudity (swimsuits, other outfits), but nothing over the top.

short_description: The Shujinkou Digital Artbook contains over 35 wide pages of sketches and renders for the various art created for Shujinkou! Check the art from our homemade application, or download the artbook as a PDF from the Title Screen!
